info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: idee.emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 22 May 2022 03:10:13 GMT Last-Modified: Thu, 17 Mar 2016 18:36:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgefp-simuap.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!PYTf0CzpSozBRLPkuunEfrOB80n4KVMeJCI8uiOH34IaotXth6/teQcIj53Q5kwcu9n0s4STD0Xcpf58Up/1QfoEcaw=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Simulateur Activité partielle | Portail des politiques publiques de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: idee.emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 22 May 2022 03:10:18 GMT Last-Modified: Thu, 17 Mar 2016 18:36:16 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgefp-simuap.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!k7IGpsVksgwqYNTkuunEfrOB80n4KT+WMjh1KU6dBkb3B08ZpvhyCuFsyR+w1chGPhvttsV/7XgWLDCC8xMej02fpHY=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Simulateur Activité partielle | Portail des politiques publiques de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: idee.emploi.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://idee.emploi.gouv.fr/'
